text.div:
Summary

Defining URLhttp://fhir.ch/ig/ch-core/NamingSystem/ahvn13
Version4.0.0-ballot
NameAHVN13
Statusactive
Definition

The AHVN13 / NAVS13 - (abbreviation for new thirteen-digit Social Security number) - is an administrative identifier for natural persons in Switzerland. It is issued, announced and administered by the Central Compensation Office. It is available to all organisations and communities for which there is a legal basis. The AHVN13 / NAVS13 shall not contain point characters for separation.

PublisherHL7 Switzerland
Copyright

CC0-1.0

Identifiers

TypeValueComment
OID2.16.756.5.32This is the official identifier

name: AHVN13
responsible: The Federal Department of Finance (FDF) / Central Compensation Office CCO
description: The AHVN13 / NAVS13 - (abbreviation for new thirteen-digit Social Security number) - is an administrative identifier for natural persons in Switzerland. It is issued, announced and administered by the [Central Compensation Office](https://www.zas.admin.ch/zas/de/home/partenaires-et-institutions-/navs13.html). It is available to all organisations and communities for which there is a legal basis. The AHVN13 / NAVS13 shall not contain point characters for separation.
